title: An Insider's Look on The Outsider
itunes:title: An Insider's Look on The Outsider
itunes:subtitle: This week's episode is special. Not only do the Losers review a new Stephen King novel (The Outsider), but they also share some Needful Tweets, roll through Hollywood King, and announce something pretty, pretty ... pretty big. Chapters...
description:
This week's episode is special. Not only do the Losers review a new Stephen King novel (The Outsider), but they also share some Needful Tweets, roll through Hollywood King, and announce something pretty, pretty ... pretty big. 


Chapters include: Intro, Needful Tweets (2:30), Hollywood King (17:24), The Outsider Non-Spoiler Review (1:02:45), The Outsider, Spoiler-Filled Review (1:23:00), The Big Announcement (1:37:00), Outro (1:42:30) 


﻿Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
